short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the 'Make payment' link in the Appointments window for future appointment dates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin solves the problem of users accidentally charging out future appointments in Acuity Scheduling. It disables the "Make payment" link if the appointment date is in the future and instead displays "Cannot charge future appointments". 

You will still be able to charge out sessions on today's date or in the past.

This plugin is not provided or supported by Acuity Scheduling or its parent company Squarespace.
